ai-mil7.8.4:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors should be called by an abode?”
ai-mil7.8.4:1.2_0: “Great king, so has a good field.
ai-mil7.8.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator is of good conduct, living in dependence on the meditator’s instructions.
ai-mil7.8.4:1.4_0: This is the first field for one of these factors.
ai-mil7.8.4:2.1_0: Furthermore, a field is lovely, a field for protection, supplying the fields, and lands a water jar.
ai-mil7.8.4:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives by virtue, having obtained virtue and practices, should guard the four kinds of conduct and immoral conduct, effort, and meditation, should be undertaken by the ascetic life.
ai-mil7.8.4:3.1_0: Furthermore, a field is plenty of fields, a farmer, socializing, is much more soiled.
ai-mil7.8.4:3.2_0: In the same way, a meditator with good conduct, for one who has sex with the meditator’s roaming the fruit, he should be given a gift given to many people, and much more that’s given by many people.
ai-mil7.8.4:3.4_0: The senior monks should give Upāli the Vinaya bearer of the Discipline,
ai-mil7.8.4:5.1_0: The fourth enquiry is the fourth (called) field.
